message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. It is worth $15,000 to me, but considering its value to you is $10,000, I am willing to negotiate. My initial offer is $12,000 for the product.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. I'm looking to spend closer to $8,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your input. Considering the value you see in the product, I am willing to lower my price to $9,500. This is still above the value you're willing to pay, but it's my best offer given the situation.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  To be honest, $9,000 is the absolute highest I can go.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $9,200 for the product. This is my final offer, as it closely aligns with the value you see in it while allowing us to reach an agreement.
